I got e-mails after the Super Bowl at 10 or 11 at night from Chrysler employees saying they've never been prouder to work for Chrysler, he said. "And these are from people who have been here 20 or 30 years." That's why Sergio Marchionne is smiling. He admits that it's great to get everyone talking about Chrysler

But he added: Obviously, when he was editor of the News of the World, bad things happened at that newspaper. I think the danger at the moment is that he is effectively being punished twice for the same offence. "I gave him a second chance. Richard Prather , a retired auto worker from Anderson, said after the Pendleton town hall that he believed Mike Pence 's reputation as a federal spending hawk would serve him well running for the governor's office. I think he would have been a good candidate for president, but I'm glad he didn't, Richard Prather said. "In the next race, he can run for president."
